cards.name: Grill Master Gary

cards.flavorText: Medium rare? That's what I'd call your mother's driving skills.

abilities.name: Bill Rage
abilities.description: Gains power when electricity bill arrives

cards.subtitle: The Sole Survivor
cards.flavorText: These babies have great arch support.

abilities.name: Comfort Zone

cards.flavorText: Get off my lawn! ...Actually, stay off everyone's lawn.

abilities.name: Grass Whisperer
abilities.description: Can identify grass type by touch

cards.flavorText: I'm not sleeping, I'm just resting my eyes.

abilities.name: Channel Memory
abilities.description: Knows every channel number by heart

cards.name: Handyman Hank
cards.subtitle: Duct Tape Diplomat
cards.flavorText: If it can't be fixed with duct tape, you're not using enough.

abilities.name: YouTube Tutorial Master
abilities.description: Can fix anything after watching one video

abilities.description: Never needs to ask for help at Home Depot

abilities.name: Mulligan Master

cards.flavorText: You never know when you'll need a flashlight, multitool, and snacks.

abilities.name: Infinite Pockets

abilities.name: Prepared for Anything
abilities.description: Always has exactly what you need

cards.name: Oil Change Oscar

abilities.name: Engine Whisperer
abilities.description: Can diagnose problems by sound alone

cards.name: TPS Report Terry

cards.flavorText: Did you get the memo about the new cover sheets?

abilities.name: Meeting Survivor
abilities.description: Can endure any length of meeting

cards.name: Skateboard Scott

cards.flavorText: I was doing kickflips before you were born. Well, attempting them.

abilities.name: Radical Recall
abilities.description: Remembers every 90s slang term

abilities.name: Hip Injury Risk

cards.name: Soccer Stan

cards.flavorText: HUSTLE! HUSTLE! ...Sorry, force of habit.

abilities.name: Orange Slice Provider
abilities.description: Always brings snacks for the team

cards.flavorText: The secret ingredient? I'll never tell. Okay, it's love. And MSG.

abilities.name: Taste Memory
abilities.description: Can recreate any dish from memory

abilities.name: Apron Shield
abilities.description: Kiss the Cook grants +10 defense

cards.name: Costco Craig
cards.subtitle: Bulk Buy Baron
cards.flavorText: We don't NEED 48 rolls of paper towels, but at this price...

abilities.name: Sample Seeker
abilities.description: Can locate free samples from any aisle

abilities.name: Hot Dog Devotee
abilities.description: $1.50 combo meal is sacred

cards.name: Christmas Clark

cards.flavorText: 25,000 lights and counting. The neighbors will learn to love it.

abilities.name: Ladder Courage
abilities.description: No roof is too high for decorations

abilities.name: Extension Cord Master
abilities.description: Can daisy-chain infinite power strips

cards.flavorText: Hi Hungry, I'm THE Dad.

abilities.name: Dad Joke Mastery
abilities.description: Every joke lands, even the bad ones

abilities.name: Universal Remote
abilities.description: Controls all devices in a 50-foot radius

abilities.name: Infinite Wisdom
abilities.description: Actually does know everything

abilities.name: Password Keeper
abilities.description: Remembers the WiFi password from 2015

abilities.name: Smoke Ring Summoner

abilities.name: Patience of a Pitmaster

cards.name: Minivan Mike

abilities.name: Snack Compartment

abilities.name: Snore Shield

abilities.name: Weed Detector

abilities.name: Flip Master

abilities.name: Infinite Recline
abilities.description: Adjusts to any position imaginable

abilities.name: Right Tool, Right Job
abilities.description: Always has what you need

cards.flavorText: 17 pockets. Each one a mystery.

abilities.name: Endless Storage

abilities.name: Video Pause Master
abilities.description: Can follow any tutorial step by step
